item.description:
Group,

Kevin Devine is coming back to TTs this Saturday and hopefully he will be with the God Damn band to support. I would highly recommend coming to the show if you like intense acoustic music. Kevin Devine fans can be pretty passionate and a lot of singing a long should be expected. It should be a great/late show. We should meet up at the show and share a UFO before Kevin goes on stage. Give me a call if you decide to go to the show. 701-331-0920.

Michael
item.how_to_find_us: TT the Bears is right next to the Middle East in Central Sq which is at the Central Stop on the Redline
item.why: Kevin Devine was one of the best opening acts I've seen so far in Boston.
item.name: Kevin Devine - Saturday - April 19th
